div.div:
Please check back frequently for updates on McCurdy Charter's CO-VID 19 response.
How can you help stop the spread?
- Wash your hands often using soap and water. Wash your hands for at least 20 seconds.
- Avoid touching your face.
- Avoid social interactions. Stay home to help stop the spread.
- Stay informed and make sure your information comes from credible sources like cdc.gov

span.span: Happy Friday, Bobcats! We hope this update finds you all safe and well.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(32, 32, 32); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Please continue reading for our updates this week.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.span: Thank you to everyone who completed the budget survey. If you have not completed the short survey, we would appreciate your feedback on budget priorities for the 2020/21 school year.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: You can find the survey at this link:

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(32, 32, 32); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: College Board is offering Career Finder™ to students free, through July 31. It is an online tool that helps students make informed academic and career decisions based on what truly drives them, and connects them to compatible schools. While exploring different careers and college majors, students get ideas for small steps they can take today to help them create a plan that supports their future aspirations. Detailed information is being provided to your high school counselors, or contact

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 124, 137); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: for more information.

span.span: Beginning Monday, we will feature a Class of 2020 Senior daily on our facebook page and the front page of website.

span.span: by Sunday, April 26.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: small;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: We are pleased to announce that Robert Nevarez has accepted the High School Football Head Coach position. We are excited to bring back Bobcat football this fall and we are so happy to have a coach who is a leader and model of integrity and positive mindset. Thank you, Mr. Nevarez! If you are interested in helping out with Bobcat football, please contact Mr. Nevarez at

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: We know that families and students are eager to pick up their belongings still at school. We will develop and share a plan based on the guidance from the Governor’s office, with a target of middle to late May. We know that social distancing will still be a priority, even in late May, and so we ask for your patience as we develop a plan that will keep all of our students, staff, and community safe.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: We are also working with the senior class to come up with a plan for a safe, on-time graduation. We hope to finalize details soon.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: Curious about what we’ve been working on while we’re not at school? We are featuring some of our great student and staff work here:

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: Breakfast and lunch grab and go will be available for free throughout the rest of the school year. You can pick up meals in our drop off lanes on the south side of campus Monday - Thursday from 8:30 - 1:00. Thursday meals will also include meals for Friday. Can’t make it to campus? You can pick up meals at any public school site, free of charge. Students are no longer required to be in the car to pick up meals.

span.span: Our thanks and best wishes to Christian Lopez who will be taking a new opportunity with Espanola Schools. We appreciate your hard work and dedication to our students and community. You will always be a welcome member of the Bobcat Family!

span.span: Feliz Viernes Bocats! Nosotros esperamos que esta actualización los encuentre a salvo y bien. Favor de continuar leyendo.

span.span: Gracias a todos los que completaron la encuesta de presupuesto. SI todavía hay alguien que no la ha completado la encuesta, agradeceríamos mucho la retroalimentación sobre el presupuesto para el ciclo escolar 2020-2021. Puedes encontrar la encuesta en

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: El consejo de educación superior está ofreciendo buscar carreras para nuestros alumnos hasta el día Julio 31. Esta es una herramienta en línea que ayuda a los estudiantes a estar informados sobre las decisiones académicas y sobre las carreras basado en sus intereses, los conecta con escuelas que son compatibles. Explorando diferentes carreras, les crea la idea de los pasos a seguir para tomar y darles soporte para su futuro. La información a detalle la tiene nuestra consejera o contactar a

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 124, 137); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: Empezando el Lunes, vamos a tener generación 2020 Seniors diario en nuestra página de Facebook y en nuestra pagina principal.

span.span: antes del día Domingo Abril 26, 2020.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 12pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Nos da mucho gusto de informar que Robert Nevarez acepto el puesto de ser el entrenador del equipo de High School Football. Estamos contentos de regresar el football en el otoño y estamos felices de tener un entrenador quien es un líder un modelo a seguir de integridad y mentalidad positiva. Gracias a Mr. Nevarez! Si están interesados en ayudar a nuestro equipo de football favor de contactar a Mr. Nevarez en

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 12pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: Se que las familias y estudiantes están ansiosos de recoger sus pertenencias. Estamos trabajando en un plan basado en la guía de nuestra gobernadora con un día posible a mediados de mayo. Sabes que la distancia social es la prioridad, quizá se extienda hasta finales de mayo. Pedimos paciencia en lo que hacemos un plan que mantendrá a nuestros estudiantes, empleados y comunidad a salvo.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 12pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: El almuerzo y lonche agarra y ve sigue gratis por el resto del ciclo escolar. Puedes recoger las comidas en las líneas donde se dejan a los niños al sur de nuestras instalaciones de lunes a jueves. De 8:30-1:00. El jueves incluye la comida para el viernes. ¿Si no puedes llegar a las instalaciones? Puedes recoger las comidas en cualquier escuela pública, gratis o con algún cargo. Los estudiantes no requieren y estar en el carro para recogerlas.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: Estar pendiente del periódico Rio Grande Sun el articulo en la Dr. Wall maestra de sexto grado!

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 12pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: Nuestros mejores deseos a Christian Lopez quien estará tomando una nueva oportunidad con las escuelas de española. Apreciamos todo tu trabajo y dedicación con nuestros estudiantes y comunidad. ¡Siempre serás bienvenido en nuestra familia Bobcat!
